Package ca.nejedly.mail.imap

Class Summary
GotMail Checks the user's inbox and returns information about user's messages.
GotMailTestLoop Help test class - FOR TESTS ONLY
GotMailTestRead Help test class - FOR TESTS ONLY
GotMailVO Value Object holding the message counts and optionally also some email message information like the subject, date, from address,...
MessageRecord Message value object
MessageRecordComparator
